means: 注视，注意（watch的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: Joseph watched a shady-looking bunch playing cards aboard a Mississippi steamer.
sentence.Network_cn: 约瑟夫看到一群可疑的人在密西西比河的一艘轮船上打牌。

sentence.Network_en: I sat in the garden and watched the passing cars.
sentence.Network_cn: 我坐在花园里，看着过往车辆。

sentence.Network_en: He stopped and watched with amusement to see the child so absorbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他停下来，饶有兴趣地看着孩子如此投入。

PerfectNetExp.abs: you walked , and watched me die ., 你走过来 , 走过来看着我死亡.
In a song , I watched the departure of a drop of rain ., 在一首歌里 , 我目送一滴雨的离去.
The police watched Perry bring drugs to the fence ., 警察看见佩里把毒品拿给买卖赃物的人.
words after watched the movie fit lover ., 写在刚刚看过 < 爱情左右 > 之后.

auth_sentence.content: I watched the procession before the flame was lit.
auth_sentence.res_content: I watched the procession before the flame was lit.

auth_sentence.content: But what if you no longer watched linear TV?
auth_sentence.res_content: But what if you no longer watched linear TV?

Sentence.sentence: Though they watched him every hour of the day, they never saw Herpin sleeping.
The most annoying thing though, is the way employees watched my friends and me.
Obama's success isn't all good news for black Americans As Erin White watched the election results head towards victory for Barack Obama, she felt a burden lifting from her shoulders
Those who had watched Obama's acceptance speech as the Democrats' presidential candidate performed just as well, on average, as the white subjects
